titles.title: 556 Abiding Oh So Wondrous Sweet (easy, very nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
E
verse 1
Abiding oh so wondrous sweet
I'm resting at the Savior's feet
I trust in Him - I'm satisfied
I'm resting in the Crucified

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Abiding - Abiding
Oh so wondrous sweet
I'm Resting - Resting
At the Savior's feet

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He speaks
And by His word is given
His peace a blessed
Gift of heav'n
Not as the world
He peace doth give
'Tis through this hope
My soul shall live

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I live
But through His grace alone
By whom
The mighty work is done
Dead to myself
Alive to Him
I count all loss
His rest to win

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Now rest
My heart the work is done
I'm saved by faith
Through Christ the Son
Let every power
My soul employ
To tell the world
My peace and joy
